ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: Try also getting into a group in Velkator s(sp?) Labyrinth  Prolly the first floor or the pit there will be good at 52.  I was in a group at the tent there
ygData.messageBody:
Try also getting into a group in Velkator's(sp?) Labyrinth Prolly the first
floor or the pit there will be good at 52. I was in a group at the tent
there with my then 50 SK but it was only cause the guy leading the group
wanted me to level up higher and we had a 60 pally, 59 Cleric and 60 chanter
in group. If you have Luclin then try getting a group in Maiden's Eye


----- Original Message -----
From: Su


Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt
to
get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the other
parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is there..
does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I
will
hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to
zone
beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the
higher
lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
Any suggestions?
luv,
-Su
